title: The Invisible Front Camera finally got one thing right...
description: Under screen cameras are going to be the future.... someday. Get a 4-week trial, free postage, and a digital scale at  Thanks to Stamps.com for sponsoring this video! ZTE is back at it again with another under screen camera inside the Axon 40 Ultra. They managed to nail the invisible part perfectly... but what about the camera part of the 'under screen camera'? How does it look? Could it pass for a regular camera? There is only one way to find out.   Get my Razor Knife here!
